com.cloudera.labs.envelope.input.translate

Interface Translator<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - The data type of the input keys
    V - The data type of the input values
    All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroTranslator, DelimitedTranslator, KVPTranslator, MorphlineTranslator, ProtobufTranslator, RawBinaryTranslator, RawStringTranslator

    public interface Translator<K,V>
extends Component
    Translators turn raw objects into structured Spark SQL Rows.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(Config config)
      Configure the translator.
      StructType getSchema()
      Get the schema of the translated objects.
      Iterable<Row> translate(K key, V value)
      Translate the raw key and value into one or more structured rows.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(Config config)
        Configure the translator. This is called once by Envelope, immediately after translator instantiation.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration of the translator.

      • translate

        Iterable<Row> translate(K key,
                        V value)
                 throws Exception
        Translate the raw key and value into one or more structured rows.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the value, which could be null if not provided or is not applicable.
        value -
        Returns:
        An iterable collection of Spark SQL Rows for the keyed value. If the keyed value only translates to a single Spark SQL Row then it can be wrapped with Collection#singleton.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getSchema

        StructType getSchema()
        Get the schema of the translated objects.
        Returns:
        The Spark SQL schema for the Rows that the translator will generate.
